item.title: An example page for the articles
item.description:
This is a quick demonstration post. It serves as an example of the features of this theme.

A Bit About Mathematics

This is an example of an epigraph to start the beginning of a section.

Shawn O'Hare, Math is Fun

item.title: COVID-19
item.description: This is a project organised by CODD-K. Introduction We face an extraordinary moment in our history, one that is bringing with it extraordinary disruption to our daily lives.
